product_name: The North Face Mezzaluna Hoodie - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: With ruched sides, The North Face Mezzaluna Hoodie offers a new twist on a classic fleece jacket. It's made from super soft, lightweight Polartec(R) fleece that you'll enjoy cozing up in. Polartec(R) Classic 100 Micro fleece features natural stretch and delivers warmth without weight. Breathes, wicks moisture and dries fast, making it great for fast hiking. Drawcord hood; 2 open hand pockets. Closeout.
short_description: With ruched sides, The North Face Mezzaluna Hoodie offers a new twist on a classic fleece jacket. It's made from super soft, lightweight Polartec(R) fleece that you'll enjoy cozing up in.
